In the motorhome workshop you can buy liquid for toilet and since you buy it, it lets you fill the water tank.

title: (08732) La Múnia - 1 Carrer de Montserrat
description: New area for MOTORHOMES in La Múnia. Drinking water and gray water area. No shade (trees will be planted soon). 2 tables with benches. Beautiful views of the Penedès. Routes in Castellví de la Marca. There is a municipal swimming pool nearby, a skate park (soon paddle tennis courts), a bar, a supermarket, other shops and a bakery. Also a Sabadell bank in the center of town. In the town there is a campers workshop and other mechanics and services. GPS: Castellvi de la Marca 08732. Enter the town, towards the municipal swimming pool. Direct GPS commands more complicated roads. Enter LA MUNIA town, look for a swimming pool/school and on the last street is the NEW AC area.

title: (08793) Les Gunyoles - 9D Carrer Soleia

No real shade, no services.

description: Set amidst rural bliss,PHONE AHEAD re availability....Surrounded by vineyards with majestic views and no neighbours pleasant walks,You will find three hectares of paradise. Our land is located near Guardiola de Font-Rubi, about 45 minutes by car from Barcelona. A quiet place where you can retreat and find total relaxation. We are currently still under construction, but we offer a beautiful natural place where you can meet.we are growing veg/ small holding There will soon be swimming pool on site which will soon be operating on a fully ecological system where the water is filtered by plants, without the use of chemicals. We plan to finish this year . care must be taken with children / dog we have sheep and chickens and work in progress, Bonfires are possible (season permitting).

title_short: (08777) Sant Quintí de Mediona - 52 Carrer del Sol de la Vila
description: RV PENEDES AREA - Sant Quintí de Mediona [ESP] Public area a quiet village of Penedès. The old town offers a very pleasant walk. Les Deus, is a natural corner where there are springs of water, a visitable grotto, an adventure park and a restaurant bar. From the front there are routes to do on foot or by mountain bike, the Camí del riu stands out. It also has a very interesting festive heritage: Carnivals, Fiesta Mayor or the Matadegolla fair. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free with potable water supply and gray and black water drainage. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

address.street: 52 Carrer del Sol de la Vila

title: (08870) Sitges - 85 Passeig Marítim
description:
Longitudinal parking spaces on a dead end street that leads to a hotel. It is a blue zone for which you have to pay during the day (see photo). There are no signs that parking for mobile homes is prohibited and the police, who constantly make patrols, have said nothing.
I downloaded the parking app (QR code on the parking column) for parking and was able to easily extend the parking space from a distance.
As already mentioned, it is a dead end, which is why it is extremely quiet.
The small tourist train also leaves right next door and you can travel along the entire beach to the busier part at the other end of the bay.
There are also showers on the beach and if you go to one of the beach bars you can also use their toilets.
All in all a top place for day and night.
